programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: Filmmaking duo Thomas and Charles Guard make their feature directorial debuts as the co-directors of this remake of Kim Jee-woon's 2003 Korean film A Tale of Two Sisters. Produced by Asian horror remake king Roy Lee, The Uninvited tells the story of a young girl named Anna (Emily Browning), who was admitted into a mental hospital following the death of her biological mother. Returning home some time later, Anna is shocked to discover that her father (David Strathairn) has recently gotten engaged to Rachel (Elizabeth Banks), her mother's former nurse. Anna's suspicions about Rachel are soon confirmed when her mother reaches out from the beyond to deliver a stark warning, prompting the young girl and her sister (Arielle Kebbel) to try and convince their father that Rachel is not who she appears to be. As the situation in the once-peaceful household rapidly begins to deteriorate, Rachel's true colors finally begin boiling to the surface

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: (2007) Jason Reitman's comedy drama stars Oscar-nominee Ellen Page as Juno McGuff, 16 and pregnant after an encounter with sometime boyfriend Paulie Bleeker (Michael Cera). She tells her father Mac and stepmother Bren (JK Simmons and Allison Janney) she intends to have the baby and then hand it over for adoption. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring (Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman) who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. Oscar-winning Diablo Cody's whip-smart script keeps the laughs coming and the action moving in one of the most lauded movies of recent years

Macy, Julia Stiles, Charles Durning, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Her Alibi
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a mystery writer seeking inspiration for his new novel who meets an enigmatic foreign beauty charged with murder. Convinced the angelic-looking Nina is innocent, the writer lies to provide her with an alibi - but when a series of bizarre and near-fatal accidents occur, his confidence is shaken

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: Film adaptation of the animated TV series stars Matthew Broderick as a security guard who, after an accident, becomes a bionic crimefighter and goes up against the villainous Claw (Rupert Everett). Brenda: Joely Fisher. Penny: Michelle Trachtenberg. Mayor Wilson: Cheri Oteri. Kramer: Andy Dick. Chief Quimby: Dabney Coleman. Brain: Don Adams

programme.title: Sweet Liberty
programme.desc: Alan Alda wrote, directed, and starred in this satirical film about the corruption of the film industry's approach to history. Alda plays Michael Burgess, a college professor who has written a historical novel about the American Revolution. The book has been turned into a script, and a Hollywood film crew descends on his North Carolina hometown to make the movie. Predictably, the director and actors make a mess of his concept, and Burgess becomes frustrated as the town is turned upside down. Desperately, he tries to salvage his concept with some last-minute script changes. To make things more complicated, Burgess falls in love with the glamorous female lead in the film, Faith Healy (Michelle Pfeiffer). Meanwhile, his long-time girlfriend, Gretchen (Lise Hilboldt) is pressuring him to get married. The film's male star, Elliott James (Michael Caine), finally shows up in town and becomes Burgess's rival for Faith's affections. Silent film star Lillian Gish appears as Burgess's smother

programme.title: Tio Papi
programme.desc: A Latino bachelor reluctantly becomes the legal guardian of his six nieces and nephews after his sister is killed in a car accident, and he struggles in his new duties as a single father in this heartwarming tale about family

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: A misfit teen forms an unlikely friendship with a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavors and forces him to confront the messiness of real life

programme.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
programme.desc: A delightful romantic comedy about a woman who becomes so disillusioned with dating men that she decides to answer a personal ad that was written by another woman. When the two meet, a tentative, awkward romance ensues

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Pre-'Rush Hour' action comedy with Chris Tucker and Charlie Sheen as a fast talking ticket scalper and annoyed tabloid journalist chasing a jewel thief

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Tame "Barbershop" knockoff stars Queen Latifah as a Chicago hairstylist who moves to Atlanta and opens up her own salon, filled with quirky workers and offbeat customers. Alicia Silverstone, Alfre Woodard, Djimon Hounsou. Latifah's character, Gina Norris, was introduced in 2004's "Barbershop 2: Back in Business."

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: Kevin Rodney Sullivan steps in to direct the urban comedy sequel Barbershop 2: Back in Business. The whole gang -- Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer), Jimmy James (Sean Patrick Thomas), Terri (Eve), Isaac (Troy Garity), Ricky (Michael Ealy), and Dinka (Leonard Earl Howze) -- are still there in the same old barbershop in the south side of Chicago. Owner Calvin Palmer (Ice Cube) tries to keep his family business alive in order to pass it on to his own son one day. However, the beloved neighborhood barber shop is threatened by a hair salon franchise called Nappy Cuts. This time around, the old friends are joined by Gina (Queen Latifah) from the beauty shop next door

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent has his hands full when a jet cargo of creepy-crawly critters is unleashed on passengers by a mob boss trying to do away with a murder witness

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: A large diamond becomes the common denominator for an interlocking network of lowlifes, thugs, gangsters and a bare-knuckle boxing champ

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Pre-'Rush Hour' action comedy with Chris Tucker and Charlie Sheen as a fast talking ticket scalper and annoyed tabloid journalist chasing a jewel thief

programme.title: Unhitched
programme.desc: A would-be writer in London tries to start a new chapter in his life when he meets the woman of his dreams—who also happens to be his friend's fiancée(n)

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck meat salesmen struggling to make a buck find that sometimes you have to grill your clients to secure the sale in this rib-tickling comedy that teams King of Queens star Kevin James with Everybody Loves Raymond star Ray Romano. Maurice (Romano) and Dave (James) have been issued an ultimatum by their frustrated boss: move some meat or hit the street. Now forced to make the sale of a lifetime or face a grim fate working behind the counter of the local butcher, the two hapless meat-slingers set their sights on a foolproof prospect that promises to provide just the funds needed to keep them afloat. Unfortunately for Maurice and Dave, their perfect plan leads them into the company of some very bad men, and now with their jobs on the line and their lives hanging in the balance, these two scheming salesmen must finalize the big deal and get the money back to the boss before they end up in the freezer with the rest of the dead meat(n)

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: A man trying to help out his sister finds himself chin-deep in hot water in this screwball comedy. Yuppie businessman Bill Campbell (Matthew Broderick) is close to sealing a $140 million business deal when he gets a phone call from his little sister Marci (Courtney Peldon), who is convinced that her new stepfather, Peter Van Der Haven (Jeffrey Jones), the mayor of the city of Buzzsaw, California, is up to no good. Though understandably wary, Bill heads to Buzzsaw, where he promptly loses his paperwork on the deal in progress and is confronted by the city's remarkable collection of eccentrics, including the crazed fugitive Sally (Heidi Kling), the subnormal Jim Jr. and Jim Sr. (John C. Reilly and Michael Monks), and Ann (Marian Mercer), the mayor's loopy wife. It turns out that Marci wasn't entirely wrong; year's ago, Peter's diabolical twin brother Matt (also played by Jones) was sent to jail in his brother's place on criminal charges, and now Matt has violent revenge on his mind. Out on a Limb features an original score by noted composer and arranger Van Dyke Parks(n)

But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her, if only they didn't mix like oil and water... programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: Matthew Broderick stars in Jonathan Kaplan's sci-fi comedy as Jimmy Garrett, a trainee air force pilot assigned to teach chimps to use flight simulators. He becomes particularly attached to VIrgil when he discovers the ape can use sign language learnt when he was part of a university programme. Then Garrett learns the real purpose of the simulator training: to fly Virgil through a fatal dose of radiation to simulate a nuclear attack on human pilots. He joins forces with VIrgil's trainer Teri McDonald, and the trio flee the establishment, but the military are hot on their heels, determined not to lose their star chimp. Edited for violence and language

programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best(n)

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The biggest babies in the entertainment business take their act to Europe in this sequel to the surprise-hit animated feature The Rugrats Movie. Chuckie (voice of Christine Cavanaugh) has been fretting over his father Chas (voice of Michael Bell) and his status as a single father, as he wants to have a mommy like all of his friends. Chas and his father Stu (voice of Jack Riley) were hired to create a bevy of electronic critters for the newly opened Euro-Reptarland theme park, but the robots are acting up, and park manager Coco La Bouche (Susan Sarandon) is hopping mad. So Stu and Chas are flown to Paris to do some repairs, with Chas bringing Chuckie and all his friends along. Their visit to the City of Lights proves to be one adventure after another, as Chuckie tries to find a suitable mother (with Coco leading the pack) and Tommy (voice of Elizabeth Dailey) somehow gets behind the wheel of the giant Reptar robot. Rugrats in Paris: The Movie features original songs from T-Boz from TLC, The Baha Men, and Mylene Farmer, while John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, and Mako contribute to the voice cast(n)

Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. Screenwriters include Craig Schulz, one of Charles M. Schulz's sons and Bryan Schulz, Craig's son and Cornelius Uliano(n)

programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.desc: Laurie Strode is still tormented by her ordeal with killer Michael Myers 20 years on. When she learns that he has escaped once again, she becomes convinced he will track her down

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's Magic Mike stars Channing Tatum as the title character, an entrepreneur who works as a roofer and in several other occupations, but makes most of his money being the star attraction at Club Xquisite, a male strip joint in Tampa that fills every weekend night with drunken, horny women eager to slide dollar bills between hard-bodied dudes and the G-strings they wear. While on a roofing job, Mike meets Adam (Alex Pettyfer), a misfit college dropout who lost a football scholarship when he punched his coach, and he decides to teach the kid how to become an exotic dancer. Mike introduces Adam to Dallas (Matthew McConaughey), the owner of the club, and gets him onto the crew of regular performers. As Dallas plans a big move for the troupe, Mike tries to start his dream business, falls for Adam's sister, and sees Adam fall to the temptations of the stripper life

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Exciting car chases and frenetic martial-arts action fortify this action-packed crime thriller from writer-producer Luc Besson. Jason Statham stars as Frank Martin, a deliveryman of illicit packages who gets mixed up in an Asian slave ring. Shu Qi, Matt Schulze, Ric Young, Francois Berleand

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later

programme.title: Everest

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Hilarious follow up to Friday. Now it's Next Friday and Craig is still living with his parents in South Central Los Angeles while looking for a job and remembering his moment of glory four years earlier, when he finally beat local bully, Debo . But now Debo has escaped from prison and is looking to exact revenge on Craig. Craig's dad takes him to Rancho Cucamonga to hide out with his Uncle Elroy and cousin Day-Day, who have moved to the suburbs after winning the lottery. But once he gets there, Craig and his cousin have a string of suburban adventures that make his South Central experiences look tame(n)

programme.title: The Insider

Jemaine has to continue with a tape recorder. Features the songs Inner City Pressure and She's So Hot...Boom!(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.desc: Corporate raider Larry 'The Liquidator' Garfield sees easy pickings in the cable company of stolid old Andrew Jorgenson. But the veteran and his wife won't go down without a fight, particularly with help from his lawyer daughter Kate. Will Larry's lust overcome his greed?(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Romantic comedy from the makers of Notting Hill. Peter Colt is a low-ranking tennis star whose misfortune on the court is only matched by his extremely bad luck in love. His life is transformed, however, when he is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon and, while there, meets and falls in love with a young American on the women's circuit. Their love match spurs him on to reach the tournament final, but will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to lift the prestigious trophy?(n)

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, now having assumed the agent's face, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch. A deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him(n)

programme.title: Baby Boy
programme.desc: (2001) John Singleton's film is set in South Central Los Angeles, where it's another day in paradise for Jody (Tyrese Gibson), a hopeless, jobless youngster whose current partner, Yvette (Taraji P. Henson) has just had an abortion. Unable to care for the child he has by another woman, Jody is forced to live with his mother Juanita (A. J. Johnson), who has another preoccupation: her growing relationship with ex-gangster Melvin (VIng Rhames). To make some cash, Jody enlists the help of his friend Sweetpea (Omar Gooding) to boost some clothes and sell them on. It's a bad decision, compounded by his actions toward Yvette and the arrival of her sinister ex-boyfriend, Rodney (Snoop Dogg) on the scene... Premiere

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: In this lively comedy, an African American yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a swinging young mail boy

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple is offered the chance to bring their late son back to life in this stylish thriller. Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), are the proud parents of a bright, happy, and healthy eight-year-old son, Adam (Cameron Bright). Paul and Jessie are highly devoted to Adam, and are devastated when he's killed in a freak auto accident. The Duncans are still stricken with grief when they're approached by Dr. Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), who makes a startling proposal -- Wells operates an experimental fertility clinic, and he's developed a technique by which an embryo could be created from cloned cells taken from their late son, which would be implanted in Jessie's womb. Nine months later, Jessie would give birth to a child exactly like Adam in every way. While Paul and Jessie are initially shocked by this suggestion, in time they decide to give Adam the chance to grow to adulthood and they take up Wells on his offer. The cloned Adam is born healthy and content, and all seems to be well until the child begins to approach his eighth birthday, when events take a startling turn

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star in this touching, no-holds-barred adventure directed by Rob Reiner that shows it's never too late to live life to its fullest. One man was smart enough to go to college, but has worked his entire life as a mechanic the other owns the hospital in which they are both patients. But these two men with little time left and even less to lose discover that life can be deeply moving and definitely hilarious

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Season of the Witch. Detective Box pieces together Naz's whereabouts on the night of the murder. Meanwhile, Naz gets revenge for a recent attack; and Stone presses Trevor for details on the night of Andrea's murder

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a sunken treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family(n)

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and Mia Kirshner star in this cheerful comedy about chance meetings. Spencer (Bradford) gets a job as a clerk at an ad agency, then is delighted to learn that an old crush (Kirshner) works there as well. One question remains: Will she find him as irresistable? David Krumholtz, Brad Rowe, Florence Stanley, Marissa Ribisi(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Action packed thriller starring Robert De Niro and Edward Norton. A professional criminal decides to leave the business for good until a young thief makes him an offer he can't refuse(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey(n)

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: Baseball could be the only ticket to success for hard-working Ryan. He wins a spot on the local team, but is caught between his off-field romance with holidaying Tenley and his sporting ambitions. Romcom with a good supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Four Oscars, including Best Picture and Best Director, went to Ron Howard's engrossing drama about John Nash, the volatile Nobel Prize-winning mathematician(n)

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: A disconnected accountant finds his mundane life injected with a new sense of urgency after striking up a friendship with a charismatic attorney in director Marcel Langenegger's sexually charged action thriller. Jonathan (Ewan McGregor) is an accountant who has lost his passion in life. When his powerful new lawyer friend, Wyatt (Hugh Jackman), introduces Jonathan to a salacious underground sex club called The List, the dejected accountant soon believes he has found the woman of his dreams (Michelle Williams). His newfound happiness takes a turn for the worse, however, when Jonathan is named the prime suspect in the woman's disappearance as well as the theft of 20 million dollars(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: The early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s. His career spanned everything from oil, for which he cared little, to movies, casinos, and aviation - as he turned millions of dollars into billions(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day(n)

programme.title: Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures
programme.desc: This revealing documentary profiles iconic and controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe via interviews with his family and lovers, examinations of his work and rediscovered footage of the late artist(n)

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Andy Garcia star in Ridley Scott's thriller as New York cops Nick Conklin and Charlie VIncent, charged with returning yakusa gangster Sato to Osaka to stand trial. But the pair are tricked into handing him over to his fellow gangsters and must, with the help of local cop Masahiro Matsumoto, track him down amid the violence and corruption of a city where they are strangers. In English, with some Japanese with English subtitles

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A fearsome group of terrorists seize control of an American battleship in this popular action film. What they do not know is that the ship's cook is a former Navy SEAL commando and an expert warrior, who is determined to defeat the terrorists and regain control of the ship

programme.title: The Long, Hot Summer
programme.desc: Orson Welles is the boss of a small Southern town who decides Paul Newman, who arrives with a reputation, will make a better heir than his weak son Anthony Franciosa. Into the mix is thrown Joanne Woodward as Welles' unmarried daughter and Lee Emick as Franciosa's passionate wife in Martin Ritt's steamy story (based on William Faulkner's stories) of smalltown life

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting?

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: Spoof comedy about an idiot journalist who travels from his native Kazakhstan to America to find pin-up Pamela Anderson. On the way, he meets rodeo cowboys, feminists, snotty dining club members and New Yorkers

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: This mockumentary comedy follows four vampire roommates and their immortal struggle to be cool. When they're not looking for their next meal, the blood-sucking foursome are stirring up trouble with the local lycanthropes and bickering over housework

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: In this collection of crime tales set in the underbelly of a miserable metropolis, a bruiser seeks the person who killed his one-night stand. Elsewhere, a cop is framed for a series of murders, and a group of prostitutes must dispose of a dead body

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: A collection of interweaving stories all based in the corrupt, crime infested hell-hole that is Basin City. Heavily influenced by film-noir, the main storylines concern a hulking brute called Marv, who is seeking the murderer of a beautiful woman who was killed while asleep in bed with him, a photographer called Dwight who is callously used and seeks revenge, and a soon-to-be-retiring policeman called Hartigan(n)

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: Diabolical vigilante Red Hood sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, as Red Hood brutally exterminates the scum of the city, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour(n)

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A wealthy couple befriend their new neighbours, but do the newcomers have ulterior motives for their friendship? Thriller(n)

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two people discover they've gotten married following a night of debauchery in Vegas, with one of them winning a jackpot after playing the other's quarter. The pair try to undermine each other and get their hands on the money(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Jason Robards plays Earl Partridge, whose son (Cruise) runs evangelical How To Get Laid seminars. A nurse contacts Cruise and the two come together for an uneasy, cathartic reunion(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images(n)

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: A newlywed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon(n)

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: Trapped in a miserable marriage and blessed with the ability to transform her misery into delicious desserts, a small-town waitress finds her life forever changed by an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: In this mesmerizing horror fantasy, an apartment manager finds a sea nymph called a "narf" in the complex's swimming pool, and tries to return her to her natural habitat. However, otherworldly monsters are out to stop him(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Powerful drama about a South African mercenary who teams up with a fisherman to recover a priceless pink diamond amid the civil war and chaos in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard: A New Beginning
programme.desc: The fists and bullets fly when respected Hong Kong bodyguard Leung (Vincent Sze) is assigned the task of traveling to the U.K. and protecting a mysterious young woman. Leung is the most-loyal bodyguard in the Hong Kong underworld. Recruited by his boss to protect a young woman in the U.K., Leung prepares to perform to the best of his abilities. But when the boss' son discovers the identity of the woman, a once-powerful empire quickly begins to crumble

programme.title: Dance of the Dead
programme.desc: High-school outcasts who weren't attending their prom try to save their classmates who are being terrorized by zombies at the big event

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: Slapstick sports comedy in which a former table tennis champion is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate an undercover tournament organised by the fiendish criminal who was responsible for the death of his father

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: Diabolical vigilante Red Hood sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, as Red Hood brutally exterminates the scum of the city, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana transforms into Wonder Woman and battles Ares to save her people in this action-packed animated adventure featuring the voice of Keri Russell as the Amazonian superheroine. Other voices include Nathan Fillion, Alfred Molina, Rosario Dawson and Virginia Madsen

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: FBI agents clash with authorities in Saudi Arabia while probing a terrorist bombing

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Spoof of '80s slasher films about a killer who targets a teenager whose mother was brutally murdered the year before

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone and Sharon Stone star in this hard-edged thriller about an ex-CIA explosives expert who helps a seductive beauty avenge the murder of her parents by a powerful Cuban-American crime boss

Leonidas is the king of ancient Sparta. The city is famous for its warrior philosophy, and Leonidas won't kneel to the demands of Persia's King Xerxes. Instead, Leonidas leads his 300-strong army against Xerxes's army of millions. Meanwhile, his wife campaigns in Sparta for the city to send reinforcements as she butts heads with the treacherous Theron

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, a mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli

programme.title: Perkins' 14
programme.desc: Dark Ride director Craig Singer returns to the helm with this shocking horror film about a delusional psychopath who creates a unified team of 14 maniacal killers. Produced entirely over the Internet, where writers uploaded story details and actors submitted audition tapes, Perkins' 14 was released into theaters as part of the third After Dark Horror Fest. Ronald Perkins was just six years old when his parents were brutally slaughtered right before his eyes. Unable to overcome the incredible trauma of witnessing such a diabolical event, Perkins becomes convinced that the killers who murdered his parents will eventually return to finish the job they started years ago -- and he plans to be fully prepared to fight back when they do. Years later, when Perkins turns 34, he kidnaps 14 people from his hometown of Stone Cove and sets about reprogramming them to become relentless killing machines. Now, if the killers ever do return, they'll have to get through Perkins' 14 in order to reach their intended target. Trouble is, now that Perkins' 14 are ready for battle, they've become increasingly difficult to contain(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: Stanhope
programme.desc: A teen in New York City gets caught up in crime as he tries to help his mom support the family(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: An undercover cop is assigned to escort a fugitive to Los Angeles, where his testimony will help put a drug lord behind bars(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting?(n)

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: This riveting psychological drama follows a quiet bank clerk (Cillian Murphy) whose life takes a sharp turn after a train accident exposes his female alter ego and threatens to destroy what remains of his sanity(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two rebellious young boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: (1997) Gary Fleder's thriller, based on James Patterson's novel, stars Morgan Freeman in his first outing as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. Called in to track the kidnapper and killer of young girls, he's joined by Dr Kate McTiernan (Ashley Judd), who has escaped the killer's dungeon. The investigation gets personal when his niece Naomi (Gina Ravera) is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Man comes under suspicion when his wife disappears(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: Quirky Coen brothers effort follows Depression-era convicts who escape a Mississippi chain gang and embark on an odyssey to find a hidden treasure. The film is rife with references to Homer's "Odyssey"(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses
programme.desc: Heavy-metal rocker Rob Zombie made his directorial debut with this clever homage to horror films of the '70s. Shortly after two couples stop at a roadside museum, they're lured into the lair of a family of psychotics led by a demented matriarch (Karen Black). Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon(n)

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: Nurse Naomi Watts gets mixed up with the Russian Mafia, but whose side is mob muscle Viggo Mortensen on? Brutal thriller from David Cronenberg. Strong language/violence/sex. (2007)(97 mins)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: Two Navy officers aboard a nuclear sub clash over their mission to avert a conflict with Russia

programme.title: Excalibur
programme.desc: Striking take on the Arthurian legend from director John Boorman, starring Helen Mirren and Nigel Terry

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: "If you build it, he will come." That's the ethereal message that inspires Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella (Kevin Costner) to construct a baseball diamond in the middle of his cornfield. At first, "he" seems to be the ghost of disgraced ballplayer Shoeless Joe Jackson (Ray Liotta), who materializes on the ballfield and plays a few games with the awestruck Ray. But as the weeks go by, Ray receives several other messages from a disembodied voice, one of which is "Ease his pain." He realizes that his ballfield has been divinely ordained to give a second chance to people who have sacrificed certain valuable aspects of their lives. One of these folks is Salingeresque writer Terence Mann (James Earl Jones), whom Ray kidnaps and takes to a ball game and then to his farm. Another is Doc Graham (Burt Lancaster), a beloved general practitioner who gave up a burgeoning baseball career in favor of medicine. The final "second-chancer" turns out to be much closer to Ray. That "magical" field in Dyersville, Iowa still draws thousands of baseball-happy tourists each year

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star in Disturbia director D.J. Caruso's race-against-time thriller concerning two strangers thrust together by a mysterious telephone call, and their frantic efforts to discover why they have inexplicably become the nation's most wanted fugitives. Jerry Shaw (LaBeouf) and Rachel Holloman (Monaghan) were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move. As the situation intensifies and the hapless duo are deemed the country's most wanted fugitives, they must work together in order to discover who it was that turned their lives upside down, and what they can do to thwart the criminal mastermind's cunning yet diabolical plan. Billy Bob Thornton, Rosario Dawson, Michael Chiklis, and Anthony Mackie co-star

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: A preacher's daughter struggles during the Civil War as she tries to keep the family farm afloat and awaits the return of her soldier beau

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: "Fatal Attraction" director Adrian Lyne tackles infidelity once again with this involving erotic thriller. Oscar nominee Diane Lane and Richard Gere are superb as a happily married couple whose union is threatened when the wife begins an affair with an attractive book dealer (Olivier Martinez). Erik Per Sullivan, Myra Lucretia Taylor

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Man comes under suspicion when his wife disappears

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin known as Agent 47 finds himself on the run with a hooker after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia. Timothy Olyphant and Dougray Scott star in this explosive adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit-man John Wick (Keanu Reeves) hits the streets of NYC in search of the gangsters who robbed him of his reason for living in this Lionsgate thriller featuring Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Adrianne Palicki, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Mobster yarn about rival gangs vying for power during Prohibition

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner stars as a journalist who is tormented by a vicious smear campaign after he exposes a CIA scandal. Absorbing biographical drama with Rosemarie DeWitt. (2014)(108 mins)(n)

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play in this blisteringly funny showbiz satire. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Joe Somebody
programme.desc: After being publicly humiliated by the office bully in front of his daughter on Bring Your Child to Work Day, a divorced office drone gives himself a makeover and starts training for a rematch. But as he unexpectedly begins climbing up the corporate ladder, he realises that he doesn't need revenge to earn his daughter's respect, or to become someone else to win the heart of his co-worker(n)

programme.title: Amazing Grace
programme.desc: In 1797, William Wilberforce, the great crusader for the British abolition of slavery, manoeuvers his way through Parliament, in an attempt to end the British transatlantic slave trade(n)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: Fans of Arnold Schwarzenegger will be delighted as Arnie takes on his biggest fight yet...with the Devil himself! Satan, played by Gabriel Byrne, is in town and he has just one thing on his mind - to impregnate a woman with the Devil's spawn before the turn of the Millennium(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor (Daniel Radcliffe), the assistant of Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy). When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. Written by Max Landis (Chronicle) and directed by Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The world's most enigmatic superhero, Batman, resurfaces for another Gotham City adventure. This time, he's pitted against villainous freak The Penguin and the devious, sexually-charged Catwoman , both of whom are out for revenge against the world which has treated them so cruelly and which Batman seems to represent. These new foes prove more than a match for him both on a professional and a personal level, especially when The Penguin enlists the help of industrialist Max Shreck to run for mayor of Gotham, and when Catwoman takes a sadomasochistic shine to her rubber-suited nemesis(n)

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Andy Garcia are the New York cops hunting a gangland killer through the Osaka underworld. Brutal neon noir directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli(n)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Alan Rickman directs the romantic drama A Little Chaos, casting Kate Winslet in the lead role of Sabine de Barra, a gifted gardener and landscaper who is chosen to design a section of the elaborate landscaping to be constructed at the palace of Versailles for Louis XIV (Rickman). The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she must also contend professionally with controlling royal gardener André Le Notre (Matthias Schoenaerts), who begins to fall for the free-spirited de Barra. A Little Chaos screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest(n)

programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Headstrong New Zealand teen Alex Archer wants to qualify for the Rome Olympic swimming team. Unlike the other top athletes she must deal with a full school workload along with personal loss

programme.title: Oscar Wilde
programme.desc: Frank account of the 19th-century playwright (Robert Morley) who was brought to trial for homosexual conduct. Phyllis Calvert. Douglas: John Neville. Ross: Dennis Price. Carson: Ralph Richardson. Clarke: Alexander Knox. Queensberry: Edward Chapman. Stagy. Gregory Ratoff directed

programme.title: The Divorce of Lady X
programme.desc: Bright, light romantic comedy starring Laurence Olivier as a barrister who, through a misunderstanding, believes he has become involved in the divorce of Ralph Richardson and Binnie Barnes

programme.title: East Side, West Side
programme.desc: The marital woes of sophisticated New York couple Mason and Stanwyck are stoked to fever pitch with the arrival of a beautiful waitress (Gardner) and an understanding cop (Heflin)

programme.title: Meet Me in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A whole slew of guest stars makes Meet Me in Las Vegas a special treat for movie buffs. The central plot concerns wealthy rancher Chuck Rodwell (Dan Dailey), who takes a Vegas vacation with his mother (Agnes Moorehead). At the same time, ballerina Maria Corvier (Cyd Charisse) also arrives in Las Vegas, accompanied by chaperone Sari Hatvany (Lili Darvas). During one marathon gambling session, Chuck comes to the conclusion that Sari is a good-luck charm, and insists that she remain by his side throughout his visit. Naturally, their relationship deepens into love, but not before a few complications, misunderstandings, and song-and-dance duets. Among the celebrities making cameo appearances (à la Around the World in 80 Days) are Jerry Colonna, Paul Henreid, Lena Horne, Frankie Laine, Peter Lorre, and Sammy Davis Jr. (voice only). Featured as dancers in Cyd Charisse's troupe are stars-to-be Liliane Montevecchi and George Chakiris

programme.title: Two Weeks in Another Town
programme.desc: An actor emerges from a mental hospital after a breakdown and is offered a role in a film by a director he's worked with in the past, but upon arriving in Rome where the movie is being shot, the troubled actor finds the production in a state of chaos

programme.title: The Wild North
programme.desc: A driven, always-gets-his-man Mountie battles the harsh Canadian winter fraught with white-water rapids, avalanches and wolf packs in his efforts to bring in a trapper who killed a man in self-defense

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: In 1927, Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont are a famous on-screen romantic pair. Lina, however, mistakes the on-screen romance for real love. Don has worked hard to get where he is today, with his former partner Cosmo. When Don and Lina's latest film is transformed into a musical, Don has the perfect voice for the songs. But Lina - well, even with the best efforts of a diction coach, they still decide to dub over her voice. Kathy Selden is brought in, an aspiring actress, and while she is working on the movie Don falls in love with her

programme.title: Brigadoon
programme.desc: Vincente Minnelli directs this charmingly whimsical musical about an American who stumbles across a ghostly Scottish village. Gene Kelly and Cyd Charisse star

programme.title: Silk Stockings
programme.desc: Cyd Charisse and Fred Astaire dance and sing to a classic Cole Porter score in this musical remake of Greta Garbo's 'Ninotchka'

programme.title: The Band Wagon
programme.desc: A has-been Hollywood dancer joins forces with a tempermental stage producer to put on a Broadway musical

programme.title: It's Always Fair Weather
programme.desc: World War II service buddies reunite in a New York City bar 10 years after their discharge only to find they haven't that much in common anymore, until one of them gets in over his head with mobsters and the other two try to help him out of the jam. Directed by Stanley Donen and Gene Kelly, who stars as one of the three GIs

programme.title: Party Girl
programme.desc: Robert Taylor stars in director Nicholas Ray's Party Girl as the traditional Ray anti-hero: a criminal lawyer who's a little bit of both. Fronting for Chicago gang boss Lee J. Cobb during the late 1920s, Taylor manages to get Cobb-underling John Ireland off on a murder rap. Cobb throws a party to celebrate the event at his penthouse, where showgirl Cyd Charisse performs a sexy dance. Ireland has the hots for Charisse, but she's more interested in Taylor. Thanks to her good influence, Taylor decides to quit the rackets. But after agreeing to take one more case for Cobb, Taylor is wounded in a shoot-out and hauled before prosecutor Kent Smith. Smith orders Taylor to testify against Cobb; the lawyer agrees to do so provided that Charisse is given police protection. Unfortunately, Cobb gets to Charisse first and threatens to throw acid in her lovely face while Taylor watches helplessly(n)

programme.title: Tension
programme.desc: Gripping thriller with Richard Basehart starring as Warren Quimby, a pharmacist whose plot to murder his wife's lover is spoilt when someone else kills the man. The police inspector investigating the case believes Quimby is responsible, though, and starts applying pressure to try and make him crack(n)

programme.title: The Unfinished Dance
programme.desc: An aspiring ballerina begins following a prima ballerina hoping that she will become her replacement. Unfortunately, another dancer is chosen, causing the determined twinkle-toes to cause a little accident to destroy the usurper's career. It works and the hapless ballerina's career is destroyed. In the end, the conniving one atones for her treachery and the two become fast friends. Danny Thomas makes his feature film debut in this musical(n)

programme.title: The White Cliffs of Dover
programme.desc: An American military nurse struggles with circumstance, class differences and World War I as she strives to marry her British love. Years later, she struggles once again as her son serves in World War II(n)

programme.title: Killer Shark
programme.desc: Yarn about a collegian (Roddy McDowall) and his misadventures amid the fishing fleets of Baja California. Maria: Laurette Luez. White: Roland Winters. Ramon: Edward Norris. Agapito: Rick Vallin. Jonesy: Dick Moore(n)

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: For his first independent production, former child star Roddy McDowall selected the tried-and-true Robert Louis Stevenson classic Kidnapped. McDowall reserves the plum role of David Balfour for himself, while Dan O'Herlihy, McDowall's costar in Orson Welles' MacBeth, is cast as Scottish patriot Alan Breck. The story is the familiar one about a young man (McDowall) cheated out of his birthright by his wicked, covetous uncle (Houseley Stevenson). Kidnapped and sold into slavery, Balfour escapes and makes his way back to Scotland, where he befriends the swashbuckling Breck and the lovely Aileen (Sue England). Several exciting adventures later, Balfour returns to his ancestral home to settle accounts with his uncle. Laid low by threadbare production values, Kidnapped is one of lesser screen adaptations of Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, though at least it's more faithful to the source than the 1938 20th Century-Fox version(n)

programme.title: The Third Day
programme.desc: In this melodrama, a man crashes his car beside a river and loses his memory. During the next three days, his memory begins to return, and few of the memories are pleasant. His wife is ready to leave him, and his cousin wants the family china-manufacturing business for himself(n)

programme.title: The Cool Ones
programme.desc: This musical comedy tells of the romantic travails of two popular singers thrust together by an ingenious promoter/matchmaker. The young male needs to revive his flagging career, while the female singer is trying to get her big break; so both of them go along with their manager's hare-brained publicity stunt(n)

programme.title: Holiday in Mexico
programme.desc: The daughter of the American ambassador to Mexico plays matchmaker for her widowed father, while he attempts to get her to switch her amorous feelings from an older pianist to the son of a British ambassador(n)

programme.title: Lord Love a Duck
programme.desc: A satirical black comedy with McDowall successfully playing a high-school senior, even though he was in his late thirties at the time! The story concerns a brilliant but unbalanced young man, who makes it his business to get the girl he has designs on everything she wants, whatever the cost(n)

programme.title: My Friend Flicka
programme.desc: A ranching family allows their son to train a filly named Flicka in this adaptation of Mary O'Hara's novel(n)

programme.title: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: The first - and considered by many to be the best - of the famous sequence of canine adventure films, with Elizabeth Taylor and Roddy McDowall as the youngsters fighting to return the plucky collie dog to her rightful home(n)

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: An account of early 20th-century life with a hard-working, fun-loving family in a Welsh coal-mining village, where they deal with love, death, union strikes and bullying(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: In this endearing, laugh-a-minute comedy, a socially awkward guy hires a professional best man to make his wedding a success. In time, their arrangement turns into a real friendship

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: In this biting comedy, an acerbic septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Gay style icon Brüno leaves Austria to cause chaos and controversy in the USA

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: This military drama is based on the true story of Carl Brashear, who was the first African-American to serve as a diver in the United States Navy. Brashear (played by Cuba Gooding Jr.) was born to a poor farming family in the deep South, and joined the Navy in hopes of bettering himself. When Brashear applies for diving school, he first encounters Master Chief Billy Sunday (Robert De Niro), a gruff and tyrannical diving instructor who holds absolute sway over his charges. Sunday does little at first to encourage Brashear's ambitions, and the would-be diver discovers racism in the military is an ugly fact of life when his white comrades refuse to share barracks with him. But Brashear's courage and determination make an impression on Sunday, and the two men become allies as Brashear must fight prejudice, military bureaucracy, and even a crippling injury in order to realize his dreams. Originally announced under the title Navy Diver , Men of Honor also features Hal Holbrook, David Keith, Michael Rapaport, Charlize Theron, and Powers Boothe; Bill Cosby served as an executive producer for the project

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family

programme.title: The Right Stuff
programme.desc: Nuanced, thoughtful drama following the pioneering efforts of the first American astronauts. Terrific performances all round, with surprising humour neatly undercutting any tub-thumping patriotism

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: In this biting comedy, an acerbic septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Retired tough guy Denzel Washington returns to his old ways to protect a girl from Russian gangsters. Slick thriller with Chloe Grace Moretz. (2014)(132 mins)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear(n)

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon and Geena Davis star in Ridley Scott's feminist road movie where what starts of as an impromptu weekend holiday sees them become fugitives on the run. They head for Mexico, chased by the police headed by Harvey Keitel who becomes increasingly sympathetic to their plight and their eventual fate(n)

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont (Steve Carell) and his relationship with brothers Dave (Mark Ruffalo) and Mark Schultz (Channing Tatum), Olympic gold-medal wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness. Moneyball's Bennett Miller directed from a script by E. Max Frye and Dan Futterman(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A pair of mismatched government operatives must recover stolen nuclear warheads from international terrorists. When missiles being transported on a Russian train are supposedly destroyed, a brash army specialist is teamed with an ambitious female executive. They soon learn a grudging respect, as the hunt for the weapons takes them across Europe and culminates in a tense Manhattan showdown(n)

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear(n)

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: When billionaire Charles Morse travels with his wife and her favourite photographer, Robert Green, to Alaska for a fashion shoot, Morse and Green become stranded in the wilderness, pursued by an enormous and terrifying bear(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont (Steve Carell) and his relationship with brothers Dave (Mark Ruffalo) and Mark Schultz (Channing Tatum), Olympic gold-medal wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness. Moneyball's Bennett Miller directed from a script by E. Max Frye and Dan Futterman(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A pair of mismatched government operatives must recover stolen nuclear warheads from international terrorists. When missiles being transported on a Russian train are supposedly destroyed, a brash army specialist is teamed with an ambitious female executive. They soon learn a grudging respect, as the hunt for the weapons takes them across Europe and culminates in a tense Manhattan showdown(n)

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear(n)

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: When billionaire Charles Morse travels with his wife and her favourite photographer, Robert Green, to Alaska for a fashion shoot, Morse and Green become stranded in the wilderness, pursued by an enormous and terrifying bear(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this slam-dunk of a family-friendly sports fable as a self-absorbed college basketball coach whose public meltdown forces him to seek redemption by mentoring a team of junior-high misfits. Wendy Raquel Robinson, Horatio Sanz, Breckin Meyer, Patrick Warburton, Megan Mullally, Oren Williams, Eddy Martin, Tara Correa(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: An ex-con takes on an undercover mission to bring down a notorious mobster. Samuel L. Jackson and Nicolas Cage star in Barbet Schroeder's remake of the classic 1947 thriller

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A billionaire art fancier orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: A suicidal ne'er-do-well puts together a bucket list for a last visit to his hometown: tell the truth to everyone close to him, confront the high school bully who made his life miserable, and try again for romance with an ex-girlfriend before calling it quits forever. The problem is, maybe life isn't done with him yet

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer racks up the miles and piles on the smiles in this wild road-trip comedy. He plays the patriarch of a dysfunctional California family, traveling to a family reunion in Missouri. En route, they encounter obstacles---and laughs---at every turn

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Sandra Bullock and Ben Affleck team up in this hilarious romantic comedy. Ben Holmes, a pretty regular guy, is on his way to his wedding. A little accident hinders the takeoff, and soon Ben finds himself in a third person's rental car together with eccentric but attractive Sarah. Several catastrophic incidents later, the two are thought to be a married couple and run into Ben's best friend and his girlfriend, who happens to be the bride's best friend. Now, Ben and Sarah have to face the problem that they really might be made for each other, but they also might just be panicking about the upcoming events: His marriage and her first meeting with a special person

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: A French blacksmith joins the Crusades and tries to achieve peace between Muslims and Christians in this spectacular historical epic

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: This raunchy teen comedy blockbuster from producer Judd Apatow ("Knocked Up") centers on a trio of nerdy high-school friends who have a wild night of misadventures while trying to buy booze for a big graduation party. Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse star. Directed by Greg Mottola

programme.title: Forces of Nature

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings

programme.title: Aloha
