Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A billionaire art fancier orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A successful bank robber manages to escape from jail. Outside he becomes involved with the Federal Marshal assigned the task of recapturing him..

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. Ironically, it is the boy who initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens(n)

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr. plays Ted, a young odontologist living in Miami who, one day, receives an inheritance. It all sounds very tempting until he goes to Alaska to collect it. What he receives is… a pack of eight sled dogs, who make his life impossible. Once he has grown fond of the toothed little creatures, he must confront Thunder Jack, the most rustic highlander in the area, who plans to leave him without the canine prize. A fast white comedy, more than recommendable when looking for one of those films to entertain children, parents and grandparents at the same time(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: This polished caper comedy, based on a Donald E. Westlake novel, pits a professional thief (Martin Lawrence) against the white-collar criminal (Danny DeVito) who stole a prized ring from him. The topnotch supporting cast includes John Leguizamo as Lawrence's partner in crime and comedian Bernie Mac as Lawrence's fence, Uncle Jack. Carmen Ejogo, Glenne Headly, William Fichtner, Larry Miller(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: An unlikely romance develops between a charming bank robber and a beautiful federal marshal after his escape from prison---but they once again find themselves on opposite sides of the law when the police learn of a diamond heist planned by the fugitive and his colorful partners in crime. Based on the novel by Elmore Leonard. George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames, Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Nick Hornby novel about the friendship that develops between a bright but awkward 12-year-old boy and a wayward thirtysomething man masquerading as a lone parent in a bid to seduce single mothers. Ironically, it is the boy who initiates the bachelor into the world of adult responsibility and meaningful relationships as the bond between them deepens(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Moving to China with his mum, young Dre Parker is bullied by the local kids until martial arts master Mr Han teaches him how to fight back(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Sequel finds Mr. Miyagi going back to his homeland of Okinawa for a reunion with the sensei's dying father, taking Daniel with him. This tearful good-bye also reopens old wounds, as a karate expert and former friend of Miyagi's named Sato has never forgiven him for a decades-old slight(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Coach Dennis Quaid makes a deal with his school baseball team: if they win the cup, he'll try out for the major league. Stirring real life sports drama(n)

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: In Martin Scorsese's classic 1970s drama, insomniac ex-Marine Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro) works the nightshift, driving his cab throughout decaying mid-'70s New York City, wishing for a real rain to wash the scum off the neon-lit streets

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Suspenseful thriller about a man dissatisfied with small-town life who inadvertently captures a murder on tape. Expecting to collect the reward money and start a new life, he instead finds himself in a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a psychopath

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: Laurel Canyon, a street that runs through the heart of the Hollywood Hills, has for decades been home to musicians, actors, artists and other bohemian types. Among its current residents is Jane, a veteran record producer trying to come up with a hit single for a British band whose lead singer Ian happens to be her much younger lover. Jane's son Sam and his fiancée Alex, are both recent graduates of Harvard medical school. Conservative and serious, the couple move to Los Angeles to complete their studies, planning to stay in Jane's home, which she had promised would be vacant. But when they arrive, Sam is distressed to discover Jane and the band still working in Jane's home recording studio. Jane's carefree lifestyle is anathema to Sam, who has devoted his life to being anyone but his mother's son. Sam and Alex grudgingly agree to stay at Jane's house until they can find an alternative place to live. Once in the house, however, Sam and Alex's tight control over their lives begins to unravel. Increasingly, Alex finds herself seduced by Jane and Ian, leaving Sam adrift, vulnerable to the approach of fellow medical resident Sara

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: A memoir of two very different brothers---one reserved, the other a hell-raiser---angling for the attention of their preacher father, who uses fly-fishing as a metaphor to teach his Cain and Abel offspring about life in early 20th-century Montana

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: In this inspiring Disney sports drama based on actual events, Kevin Costner plays a high-school football coach who ends up leading a cross-country track team made up of lower-class Latino students to a state championship. Jim White (Costner) finds his days as a football coach numbered when an incident with a player leads to his dismissal. Desperate for work, he moves his wife (Maria Bello) and daughters (Morgan Saylor and Elsie Fisher) from Idaho to McFarland, CA, a rural town that's predominately Latino and the only place willing to give him a teaching job. The family feel like they don't fit into their new community, but White has an epiphany one day when he sees his students running from their early-morning farming jobs to school: Why not channel their talents into running cross-country track? Soon enough, White is connecting with his young charges, particularly a gifted athlete named Thomas (Carlos Pratts), and the squad set their sights on a state championship

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell is completing a lonely three-year contract with Lunar Industries mining Earth's primary source of energy, Helium-3 on the Moon. As he prepares to finally return to Earth, Sam has to confront himself and the discovery that the life he has created may not be his own and it's more than his contract that is set to expire

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: In this mystical and nonlinear drama, a mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer

programme.title: The Fourth Kind
programme.desc: In this disturbing chiller, an Alaskan psychotherapist uncovers irrefutable evidence that aliens are abducting humans during sessions with her patients

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Suspenseful thriller about a man dissatisfied with small-town life who inadvertently captures a murder on tape. Expecting to collect the reward money and start a new life, he instead finds himself in a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a psychopath

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: A recent film-school grad gets a dream job as a personal assistant to a Hollywood mogul, who not only tyrannizes him, but also takes credit for his script

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell is completing a lonely three-year contract with Lunar Industries mining Earth's primary source of energy, Helium-3 on the Moon. As he prepares to finally return to Earth, Sam has to confront himself and the discovery that the life he has created may not be his own and it's more than his contract that is set to expire

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: Director Tim Burton brings imagination and style to this heartwarming fantasy about a dying Southern raconteur and the estranged son who has been alienated by his tall tales

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: In this inspiring Disney sports drama based on actual events, Kevin Costner plays a high-school football coach who ends up leading a cross-country track team made up of lower-class Latino students to a state championship. Jim White (Costner) finds his days as a football coach numbered when an incident with a player leads to his dismissal. The family feel like they don't fit into their new community, but White has an epiphany one day when he sees his students running from their early-morning farming jobs to school: Why not channel their talents into running cross-country track? Soon enough, White is connecting with his young charges, particularly a gifted athlete named Thomas (Carlos Pratts), and the squad set their sights on a state championship

programme.title: The Midnight Meat Train
programme.desc: Japanese director Ryuhei Kitamura ("Versus") makes his Hollywood debut with a literate, suitably grisly adaptation of Clive Barker's short story. A photographer (Bradley Cooper) becomes obsessed with a serial killer (Vinnie Jones) who stalks the subways. Leslie Bibb, Brooke Shields(n)

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Actor Vincent Gallo (The Funeral, Palookaville) made his feature directorial debut with this drama about convict Billy Brown (Gallo), released after half a decade spent behind bars. Drifting into downtown Buffalo, Billy kidnaps teen Layla (Christina Ricci) and has her pose as his loving wife when he visits his parents (Ben Gazzara and Anjelica Huston). Layla praises him and goes along with his fanciful tale that they met at CIA headquarters, where they both worked. Mom and dad not only fall for this, they are entranced by Layla, who soon begins to embellish her act. When she claims to be pregnant by Billy, he hustles her out to a bowling alley and on to a restaurant, where they run into trampy Wendy (Rosanna Arquette), who might be Billy's former girlfriend. Eventually, Billy seems ready to track down and kill the person he feels was responsible for his five years in the slammer. Shown at the 1998 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Crime of Padre Amaro
programme.desc: Nominated for a Best Foreign Language Film Oscar, this controversial and powerful story stars Gael Garcia Bernal as a newly ordained priest who struggles with his conscience after he discovers a corrupt church bureaucracy and falls for a parishioner. Sancho Gracia, Ana Claudia Talancon, Damian Alcazar(n)

programme.title: Freetown
programme.desc: A group of Liberian missionaries seek asylum from a brutal civil war. To reach religious and personal freedom, they must travel across their war-torn country while evading rebels out to kill one of their own(n)

programme.title: Merchants of Doubt
programme.desc: This provocative documentary spotlights scientists who are hired by special-interest groups to cast doubt on hotly debated issues, such as climate change, tobacco use and damage from toxic chemicals(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's opulent and revisionist biopic of the teenage Austrian princess who married France's Louis XVI(n)

programme.title: Manhattan
programme.desc: A writer toys with quiting his job; leaving his current wife; and committing to his teenage girlfriend. Meanwhile, he is falling for his best friend's mate; and his lesbian ex-wife has written a tell-all book(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: In this disarming fantasy told largely through flashbacks, young reporter William Bloom attempts to learn more about his dying father by finding the truth behind a lifetime of his fanciful tall tales and legends of epic proportions(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola's opulent and revisionist biopic of the teenage Austrian princess who married France's Louis XVI(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Through a Glass, Darkly. In the Season 2 premiere, Jamie and Claire arrive in France, where they hope to infiltrate the Jacobite rebellion and put a stop to the Battle of Culloden. Thrown into the plush world of French society, they experience court intrigue and struggle to make any headway politically(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Not in Scotland Anymore. In Paris, Jamie struggles to deal with his past, and a fortuitous encounter with Prince Charles affords him promising opportunities, but the Duke of Sandringham's presence complicates matters(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Useful Occupations and Deceptions. Political machinations dominate most of Jamie's time, while Claire puts her healing skills to use. Their plan to stop Culloden moves along, but the forward momentum is jeopardised by past actions(n)

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Actor Vincent Gallo (The Funeral, Palookaville) made his feature directorial debut with this drama about convict Billy Brown (Gallo), released after half a decade spent behind bars. Drifting into downtown Buffalo, Billy kidnaps teen Layla (Christina Ricci) and has her pose as his loving wife when he visits his parents (Ben Gazzara and Anjelica Huston). Eventually, Billy seems ready to track down and kill the person he feels was responsible for his five years in the slammer. Shown at the 1998 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Nice Dreams
programme.desc: A tale of two drug dealers operating out of an ice-cream truck

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Boston architect Newton Davis is an impulsive dreamer who builds a bucolic dream home for his girlfriend as a means of proposing to her -- only she turns him down. Three months later, the depressed Davis meets a waitress who calls herself Gwen, though pretending to be Hungarian proves to be only the first of her many deceptions

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A mysterious potion prompts a group of elves, goblins, imps, and fairies on an incredible adventure in this fantastical fantasy inspired by William Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: The south of France... Two rival con men -- one is suave and sophisticated, the other is a third-rate American hustler -- make a wager. The first one who extracts $50,000 from the next woman they meet wins...and the other leaves town

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: David Schwimmer stars in this romantic comedy as an insecure sportscaster. He devises a scheme to test his fiancée's loyalty by persuading his best friend (Jason Lee) to try to seduce her. His plan backfires, however, when the two fall in love. Mili Avital, Bonnie Hunt, Vanessa Angel

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Richard Pearce's comedy-drama stars Steve Martin as Jonas Nightengale, a con artist whose latest scheme has him posing as a traveling evangelist. When his caravan breaks down in a poor Southern town, he tries to make the best of the situation by exploiting the community for all its worth

programme.title: Mixed Nuts
programme.desc: Humorous happenings behind the scenes at a crisis hot line provide the laughter in this comedy based on a French hit movie. The center, Lifesavers, located in Venice California, is operated by Philip. Upon the outside sign it announces with pride the number of people it has saved. But while the place is designed to help others it is plain to see that it is the staff counselors who really need the help. Included on staff are the over-emotional Catherine, a lonely woman who dreams of her shiny rescuing Knight while still living with her mother, and Blanch Munchnik a widow with a sharp tongue. When the holidays come, it is Lifesavers itself that needs the lifesaving as the landlord is threatening to boot them out if they don't pay a large amount of money. As they try to come up with the cash, the place is constantly bombarded by an assortment of mixed nuts including an Amazonian transvestite

programme.title: Blankman
programme.desc: Are you ready for a new kind of superhero -- a thirty-something virgin in long underwear? Darryl Walker (Damon Wayans) is a bright but socially inept man with a gift for inventing things but little skill for functioning in the real world. His brother Kevin (David Alan Grier) works on a low-class tabloid news show featuring beautiful anchorwoman Kimberley Jonz (Robin Givens), whom he secretly loves. The Walkers live in Metro City, Illinois, a city that's been hit with a massive crime wave after the mayor is kidnapped by gangsters. After his grandmother is killed, Darryl builds a collection of crime-fighting robots from household junk, invents bullet-proof long underwear (made from his grandmother's old housecoat), and becomes Metro City's newest crime fighter, Blankman. Blankman's escapades put fear into the heart of mob boss Michael Minelli (Jon Polito), and when Kevin turns out to have an inside track on Blankman's activities, it brings him closer to Kimberley. But how long can a superhero with no superpowers last against the forces of organized crime? Damon Wayans wrote the original story for Blankman as well as co-writing the screenplay and playing the title role, which was based in part on his "Handi-Man" character from the TV comedy series In Living Color

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: David Schwimmer stars in this romantic comedy as an insecure sportscaster. He devises a scheme to test his fiancée's loyalty by persuading his best friend (Jason Lee) to try to seduce her. His plan backfires, however, when the two fall in love. Mili Avital, Bonnie Hunt, Vanessa Angel

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: During the Seattle grunge era, twentysomethings living in the same apartment complex come to terms with real life in the grown-up world

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: The south of France... Two rival con men -- one is suave and sophisticated, the other is a third-rate American hustler -- make a wager. The first one who extracts $50,000 from the next woman they meet wins...and the other leaves town

programme.title: Cool World
programme.desc: Comic fantasy mixing live action and animation. Gabriel Byrne finds himself sucked into a parallel cartoon world, while Kim Basinger plays the inky femme fatale who is desperate to achieve human form. When she does, the pair are pursued back to the real world by 'toon detective Brad Pitt(n)

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: David O. Russell co-wrote and directed this wild, wacky and wonderful farce that examines the multifaceted fallout of an environmentalist's existential crisis, suffered while battling a giant department store's dubious intentions. Jason Schwartzman, Jude Law, Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin, Naomi Watts, Mark Wahlberg, Isabelle Huppert, Ger Duany, Kevin Dunn(n)

programme.title: First Monday in October
programme.desc: Based on a Broadway play by Jerome Lawrence and Robert E. Lee, conservative Ruth Loomis (Jill Clayburgh) becomes the first woman to be appointed to the United States Supreme Court, much to the dismay of liberal justice Dan Snow (Walter Matthau). Oddly enough, the appointment of Sandra Day O'Connor as the first woman justice of the Supreme Court occurred the same year that First Monday in October was released(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: High school student Cody is a pint-sized CIA agent whose only flaw is that he's tongue-tied with girls. And his next mission is to cosy up to a top scientist's gorgeous daughter(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: If Lucy Fell
programme.desc: Romantic comedy set in New York starring Sarah Jessica Parker and Eric Schaeffer as flatmates who've agreed to jump off the Brooklyn Bridge if neither is in a relationship by the time they're 30. Ben Stiller and Elle MacPherson co-star as two potential partners who meet them with less than a month to go to D-Day(n)

programme.title: Cool World
programme.desc: Comic fantasy mixing live action and animation. Gabriel Byrne finds himself sucked into a parallel cartoon world, while Kim Basinger plays the inky femme fatale who is desperate to achieve human form. When she does, the pair are pursued back to the real world by 'toon detective Brad Pitt(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Sacked for crashing another cop car, Andy flags down a cab to get to a bank robbery. The cabbie is so speedy that he decides to team up with her to catch a crew of sexy Brazilian robbers. Action comedy(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: A charming-as-ever Diane Keaton stars as a desperate housewife who gets a job as a janitor at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other low-level employees (Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. Oscar-winning screenwriter Callie Khouri ("Thelma & Louise") directed. Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: High school student Cody is a pint-sized CIA agent whose only flaw is that he's tongue-tied with girls. And his next mission is to cosy up to a top scientist's gorgeous daughter(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Sacked for crashing another cop car, Andy flags down a cab to get to a bank robbery. The cabbie is so speedy that he decides to team up with her to catch a crew of sexy Brazilian robbers. Action comedy(n)

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: David O. Russell co-wrote and directed this wild, wacky and wonderful farce that examines the multifaceted fallout of an environmentalist's existential crisis, suffered while battling a giant department store's dubious intentions. Jason Schwartzman, Jude Law, Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin, Naomi Watts, Mark Wahlberg, Isabelle Huppert, Ger Duany, Kevin Dunn(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military-defense contractor is rehired by his former boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. He reconnects with an old flame while there, but finds himself increasingly drawn to an Air Force pilot assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling
programme.desc: A comedian has a near death experience where he reviews his life as a result of burning himself from using drugs

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Eddie Kasalivich, an undergraduate at the University of Chicago, works as a technician for a scientific team that discovers an alternative, low-cost, pollution-free fuel source. When one of the chief scientists is murdered and the invention stolen, Eddie and physicist Lily Sinclair are framed for it and have to flee for their lives, with the FBI, CIA and other involved parties in close pursuit

programme.title: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Thriller about a woman who takes the law into her own hands to avenge the rape and murder of her daughter. Although the police arrest a suspect soon after the incident, he is released on a technicality. Frustrated by the impotence of the law, the girl's mother turns to a secret vigilante organisation and plots her revenge against the killer

programme.title: Blast!
programme.desc: When a threatening gang of terrorists hijack an oil rig off the coast of California, it's up to a former Navy Seal to ensure that their deadly plan is thwarted in this explosive action entry from veteran genre specialist Anthony Hickox. When Lamont Dixon (Eddie Griffin) took a job as a tugboat captain, he thought his days as a fighting military man were behind him, but when an offshore drilling protest unexpectedly turns into a terrorist hijacking, Dixon must leap into action to save the entire state of California. As the hijackers reveal part of their scheme and Dixon begins to suspect that there is more to the elaborate plan then they let on, his only hope is to team with sexy FBI agent Lisa Reed (Vivica A. Fox) to coordinate a counterstrike from the shore and save the lives of both the hostages and thousands of unsuspecting citizens

programme.title: American Milkshake
programme.desc: Filmmakers Mariko Munro and David Andalman team to write and direct this dark coming of age comedy set in the 1990s, and exploring the subjects of adolescent racial and sexual identity through the eyes of Al Jolson's great-great grandson Jolie (Tyler Ross), who takes the first step toward realizing his dream of being like the cool black teens in the Maple Avenue projects by joining his high-school basketball team

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure combining live action and animation. The Looney Tunes characters capture sports star Michael Jordan to help them win a basketball tournament

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping an assassination attempt on Air Force One, the president ends up stranded in the wilderness of Finland in this pulse-pounding thriller. A 13-year-old hunter soon finds him, and they work together to evade a group of terrorists

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Proud mum Ma'Dere Whitmore welcomes her children home for Christmas, but finds her offsprings' troubled personal lives causing sack loads of seasonal strife

programme.title: Accidental Love
programme.desc: A waitress starts behaving strangely after she gets a nail stuck in her skull. Later, she falls for a dim-witted senator during a trip to Washington, D.C

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A young woman hunts for her parent's killer, only to become a relentless assassin in a corrupt society where crime and gangs rule the streets(n)

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Upon gathering together under one roof for the first time in seven years, an estranged family celebrating Christmas rediscovers long-forgotten bonds in this holiday family reuniondrama starring Delroy Lindo, Regina King, and Mekhi Phifer(n)

programme.title: Death Hunt
programme.desc: Adventure set in the Canadian wilderness about a tough mountie on the trail of a trapper he believes to be guilty of murder. The trapper is innocent, but he refuses to be brought in and uses all of his survival skills and resources to evade capture(n)

programme.title: A Rage in Harlem
programme.desc: Bill Duke directs this quirky film adaptation of Chester Himes' crime novel -- a heavily plotted gangster tale with a sweet love story hidden underneath. The film begins in Natchez, Mississippi in 1956. During a police shoot-out with the mob leader Slim's (Badja Djola) gang, Slim's moll Imabelle (Robin Givens) takes off with a cadre of stolen gold. As a result, Imabelle is chased by Slim's mob from Mississippi to New York. By the time she reaches Harlem, she is broke and has to figure out a way to ditch the trunk full of gold. She finds herself at the annual Undertaker's Ball, where she sees the big and dumb Jackson (Forest Whitaker), a bumbling undertaker's assistant. She spots Jackson as a mark that she can use as a cover and latches onto him immediately. She moves in with him to hide out, but Imabelle becomes taken with his innocence. For his part, Jackson falls head over heels in love with her. But the Mississippi mob catches up with her and takes her away. Jackson calls in his street-wise brother Goldy (Gregory Hines) to help him rescue Imabelle. Jackson fears that Imabelle has been kidnapped. But Goldy knows better -- he still agrees to help him but Goldy wants the gold for himself(n)

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: (2005) Bruce Hunt's horror film, set in Romania, begins with a prologue in which a group of treasure hunters break into a blocked cave beneath a church. They become entombed and discover the terrible truth of why the cave was sealed centuries before... Thirty years later, a team led by cave diver Jack (Cole Hauser), his brother Tyler (Eddie Cibrian) and scientist Nicolai (Marcel Iures) force their way in to the same cave and descend into a labyrinth of passages and rivers in the search for species unknown to man. But waiting in the dark is a species that feasts on human flesh... ; HD Wide(n)

programme.title: Hard Time
programme.desc: Detective Logan McQueen and long time partner, Charles Duffy, stumble onto a drug deal and decide to intervene. Logan, who is fit, trim and in his mid-50's takes off after three young thugs, Catarato, Chu Chu and Pepe. They have just snatched a bag full of money that was a pay off from drug lord, Conrad Martin, on its way to an unknown recipient. Duffy, who is overweight, in his 60s and just a few weeks from retirement, can't keep up with his partner(n)

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. In the future, machines rule the Earth, but people are fighting back, so a supercomputer seeks to destroy humankind by sending a virtually indestructible cyborg back in time to kill the human resistance leader in his youth. The boy and his mother, aided by another cyborg, try to alter the events that led to the supercomputer's creation and the subsequent nuclear war(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test(n)

programme.title: In the Mix
programme.desc: R&B singer Usher stars in Ron Underwood's crime caper as Darrell, a DJ who, through a series of coincidences, ends up bodyguard to Dolly, daughter of Mafia mobster Frank. The two fall for each other, much to the anger of Frank, who as well as trying to keep control of his daughter, has to contend with a major Mob power struggle. As the bullets fly, Darrell finds he's not only protecting Dolly, but also Frank and himself!(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit in this high-octane superhero flick. Donning the technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention

programme.title: The Final Season
programme.desc: Following in the spike marks of "Field of Dreams" and "The Natural" comes a winning, fact-based saga about an Iowa small town faced with the closing of their high school, which has had an incredible string of championship baseball teams. Powers Boothe stars as the long-time manager "who [grows] ballplayers like corn" and who gets squeezed out of his position by the school board. Sean Astin costars as his inexperienced successor. Rachel Leigh Cook. Directed by David Mickey Evans ("The Sandlot")

programme.desc: SOS Bonobos. The Green Squad hopes to free a captive baby bonobo in the Congo

programme.title: Savage Family Wild
programme.desc: Fire in the Australian Bush. The Green Squad vacation at a koala sanctuary, where a bush fire threatens the preserve

programme.title: Savage Family Wild

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A witch curses a baker and his wife, binding their fates to those of numerous fairy tale characters including Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Rapunzel and Jack of "Jack and the Beanstalk" in this Stephen Sonheim musical

programme.title: War Room
programme.desc: A seemingly perfect couple are actually dealing with a failing marriage, and seek advice from an elderly woman who urges them to find fulfillment through prayer

programme.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
programme.desc: Michael Landon Jr. directed this touching feature adaptation of the beloved children's book. Sent by his father to spent Christmas with his grandmother, Toby discovers a "magic attic" in her home. There, he finds a stuffed velveteen rabbit that his mother had purchased for him before she died. As Toby begins to cry, his tears magically bring the rabbit to life. Later, when Toby falls ill, the courageous rabbit helps him to make a full recovery

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Directed by Roland Emmerich, this mega-budget, special-effects-laden epic revolves around the onset of an international series of crises brought on by the long-term results of the greenhouse effect. At the eye of the storm is paleoclimatologist (a professor dedicated to the study of weather patterns throughout the ages) Jack Hall (Dennis Quaid), who voluntarily takes on the preservation of the world in the dawn of the next ice age and all the disaster that comes along with it -- violent hurricanes, tornadoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, massive floods, etc. Hall must also contact his son, Sam (Jake Gyllenhaal), who was in the middle of an academic competition in New York City when the chaos begun. In addition to facing the largest-scale onslaught of natural catastrophes in the history of humankind, Jack, in his journey north, must contend with the masses fleeing south in an attempt to resettle in a warmer climate. The Day After Tomorrow also features Emmy Rossum, Sela Ward, and Joe Cobden

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: When a criminal plot threatens the hi-tech metropolis of San Fransokyo, brilliant young robotics whiz Hiro Hamada (voice of Ryan Potter) leaps into action with his tech-savvy friends, and his robot companion Baymax (voice of Scott Adsit) in Disney Animation's adaptation of the popular Marvel Comics series

programme.desc: Lighthearted comedy drama about four ghosts who have the chance to tie up loose ends before moving on to the afterlife. In life, they were very different people who all happened to be passengers on a bus which crashed, killing everyone on board. At the time of the crash, a baby is born in a nearby car and the four spirits become linked to the child - little knowing that he can help them sort out the lives they left behind

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: From the producers of The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe and the mind of author Katherine Paterson comes a rousing fantasy adventure about family, friendship, and the wondrous power of imagination. A perpetual outsider both at home and at school, Jess Aarons (Josh Hutcherson) just never seems to fit in no matter how hard he tries. When his goal to become the fastest runner in middle school is unexpectedly thwarted by newly arrived classmate Leslie Burke (AnnaSophia Robb), who enters in an "all boys" race and leaves her competitors in the dust, Jess soon strikes up a friendship with the imaginative outsider. Their bond is soon cemented thanks to Leslie's love for storytelling and Jess' skill as an artist, and the two lonely kids create a secret kingdom called Terabithia that is only accessible by swinging over a stream on a nearby rope. Though Jess and Leslie may be considered outcasts by their classmates, their adventures in Terabithia find the pair doing battle against the dreaded Dark Master and his malevolent creatures while plotting revenge against the schoolyard bullies. Now, thanks to his adventures in Terabithia and his friendship with Leslie, Jess finally finds the confidence needed to stand tall and be himself(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Boxing's first medal bouts take place in men's light flyweight, while London gold medalist Claressa Shields of the U.S. returns to action in women's middleweight. Four other men's boxing classes are in action, including lightweight semifinals and light-heavyweight quarterfinals

programme.title: Olympics 2016

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Four Falls of Buffalo. The Buffalo Bills incredible four year run of AFC titles and four consecutive Super Bowl losses in the early 1990s are recounted in this sports documentary directed by Ken Rodgers. From plucky underdogs to perennial losers, the Bills' unprecedented run of futility is analyzed by the players, coaches, and media members who were involved. Four Falls of Buffalo is a part of ESPN's critically acclaimed 30 For 30 documentary series

programme.desc: Brian and The Boz. Thaddeus D. Matula's documentary Brian and The Boz profiles Brian Bosworth, who became one of the greatest defensive players in the history of college football during his career at Oklahoma University. He was a brash personality, but his behavior and his ego led to trouble during his professional career where he flamed out after only a few seasons. This film features Bosworth looking back on his past, and was produced as part of ESPN's 30 for 30 series of non-fiction sports films

programme.title: Doctor Who

Amy and Rory are trapped on a crashing space liner, and the only way The Doctor can rescue them is to save the soul of a lonely old miser. But is Kazran Sardick, the richest man in Sardicktown, beyond redemption? And what is lurking in the fogs of Christmas Eve?(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Snowmen. It is Christmas Eve, 1892, and the falling snow is the stuff of fairytales. When the fairytale becomes a nightmare and a chilling menace threatens Earth, an unorthodox young governess, Clara, calls on the Doctor for help. But the Doctor is in mourning, reclusive and determined not to engage in the problems of the universe. As old friends return, will the Doctor really abandon humankind, or will he fight to save the world and Christmas from the icy clutches of this mysterious menace?(n)
